head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths KAMINASH, MARJORIE (NEE SPECTOR)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths KAMINASH, MARJORIE (NEE SPECTOR)

block.p: KAMINASH-Marjorie (nee Spector). Died August 29, 2000. Devoted wife of Manny. Beloved mother of Benjamin, Rosanne and Nancy. Dear sister of Ruth and Isabel. Cherished grandmother of Jesse, Joshua, Britt, Maura, Zachary, Liam and Tyler. Services at I.J. Morris, 1895 Flatbush Avenue, Brooklyn, New York, Thursday, August 31 at 12:00 noon.

KAMINASH-Marjorie (nee Spector). Died August 29, 2000. Devoted wife of Manny. Beloved mother of Benjamin, Rosanne and Nancy. Dear sister of Ruth and Isabel. Cherished grandmother of Jesse, Joshua, Britt, Maura, Zachary, Liam and Tyler. Services at I.J. Morris, 1895 Flatbush Avenue, Brooklyn, New York, Thursday, August 31 at 12:00 noon.
